com.dinggoapplication.managers

Class ReviewManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.dinggoapplication.managers.ReviewManager

  • public class ReviewManager
extends java.lang.Object
    Review Manager class handles all the reviews in the application
    Version:
    2.1 Created by Leon on 17/8/2015.
    Author:
    Lee Quee Leong & Seah Siu Ngee

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      java.util.HashMap<java.lang.String,java.lang.Float> getAverageRatings(java.lang.String companyId)
      Retrieve the average rating received by the merchant Format of the hash map is a follows: numReviews | x.x service | x.x value | x.x ambience | x.x food_drink | x.x total | x.x Parse exception will be thrown for the following reasons: No results found Unable to retrieve any reviews from Parse due to server error Unable to retrieve any company due to server error or invalid company Id Logic error in the cloud clouds

      Retrieve the number of checkouts for the ReviewManager object

      Retrieve Review object according to the ID of the review
      java.util.ArrayList<Review> getReviewsFromCache(Company company)
      Method that retrieve reviews from local data store and pass the retrieved reviews back to the invoker
      java.util.ArrayList<Review> updateCacheList(Company company)
      Retrieve all reviews from Parse database and pin all the reviews into user's local database tag with a label according to company ID Retrieve all reviews from cache upon completion

        public java.util.ArrayList<Review> updateCacheList(Company company)

        Parameters:

        Returns:

                 throws com.parse.ParseException

      • getAverageRatings

        public java.util.HashMap<java.lang.String,java.lang.Float> getAverageRatings(java.lang.String companyId)
                                                                      throws com.parse.ParseException
        Retrieve the average rating received by the merchant Format of the hash map is a follows: numReviews | x.x service | x.x value | x.x ambience | x.x food_drink | x.x total | x.x Parse exception will be thrown for the following reasons: No results found Unable to retrieve any reviews from Parse due to server error Unable to retrieve any company due to server error or invalid company Id Logic error in the cloud clouds
        Parameters:
        companyId - ID of the company
        Returns:
        Hash of average ratings according to the merchant
        Throws:
        com.parse.ParseException
